nodes.text: Dex was a Rebel pilot and a member of Rebel Alliance. She once saved Blue Five from TIE/IN interceptors and became an ace. During the ambush on Ral's Run, she became the first member of the squadron to shoot down a capital ship by destroying the Ton-Falk-class escort carrier Imperial Protector.
Dex was mentioned in the opening story of Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game sourcebook Stay on Target.
